name: @unphased/ts-utils
typesComments: TODO: make web .d.ts live somewhere less awkward

scripts.test: npm run build && npm run build-test && node --enable-source-maps dist/tests.js --import-js-only
scripts.build: cp pre-commit .git/hooks && rm -rf dist dist-web && for file in terminal.ts utils.ts node/format.ts color/index.ts structures/LRUCacheMap.ts network/index.ts; do esbuild src/$file --bundle --sourcemap --platform=node --format=esm --outfile=dist/${file%.ts}.js; done && for file in src/web/*.ts; do esbuild $file --bundle --sourcemap --platform=browser --format=esm --outfile=dist-web/${file%.ts}.js; done
scripts.watch-test: watchexec -w src -w package.json -e ts,js,json -r --stop-signal=INT -- npm run test "$@"
scripts.watch-test-old: bash -c 'watchexec --exts ts --only-emit-events --emit-events-to=json-stdio | while read line; do echo received: $line; echo "Skipped $(timeout 1 cat | wc -l) further events"; npm run test "$@"; done' _
scripts.install-hooks:
echo '#!/bin/sh
npm run lint-errors || true' > .git/hooks/pre-commit && chmod +x .git/hooks/pre-commit

author: Steven Lu
